text: Buzhan () is a rural locality (a village) in Abulyaisovsky Selsoviet, Zianchurinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 72 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 62 km from Isyangulovo, 11 km from Malinovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Zianchurinsky District
title: Buzhan, Zianchurinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
